sn1.5:3.1: The enigmatic repetition of “five” is reminiscent of Bṛhadāraṇyaka Upaniṣad 4.4.17: “Where the five groups of five and space are established, I regard that Self as the immortal Brahman, knowing which I am immortal.” | The redactors show their playful side here, placing this as the fifth sutta of the Saṁyutta.
